snippet.title: We Live Inside a Dream - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
We are like the dreamer who dreams, and then lives inside the dream...but who is the dreamer?

Play here! (for Free): https://mrwhalefarmer.itch.io/we-live-inside-a-dream
Soundtrack: https://open.spotify.com/album/6s1jTDF3HnO9ttJtGSVSSN

Developed by Damien Cochrane
Soundtrack by Gueladrian

Additional Music by: 
Red Starlights: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HK5xtmu021U
Sangam: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6xOy5ogeKmQ
Luke Pigott: https://lukepigott.bandcamp.com/
Neil Hinchley: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ab5nIkKmEqo
Chronic Ion: https://www.reverbnation.com/6076872/album/231254
Quiet Winter: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ylfZdkXxulU
FilthyFrackers: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K1vXEDEAYg0&t=2s
Jim Slatts & Josh Coker: https://open.spotify.com/artist/10rR6kZBHDQDHCp5LYvpea
Laist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vPlNUUV7QJ0

We Live Inside a Dream is a first person interactive experience with hints of FPS, puzzles, driving and stealth gameplay elements. Created in Unreal Engine 4.19.

*Showtime, ABC, and/or David Lynch & Mark Frost are not affiliated with this fan project whatsoever.

Note: After further investigation, a Steam release was not plausible. Steam's registration process requires an NDA being signed to establish rights/ownership - which I was not comfortable doing as We Live Inside a Dream is purely a fan creation.
